name: MinerU (opendatalab)
description: [项目级] Transforms complex documents like PDFs into LLM-ready markdown/JSON for your Agentic workflows.。来源: https://github.com/opendatalab/MinerU

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
MinerU is a tool that converts PDFs into machine-readable formats (e.g., markdown, JSON), allowing for easy extraction into any format.
MinerU was born during the pre-training process of [InternLM](https://github.com/InternLM/InternLM). We focus on solving symbol conversion issues in scientific literature and hope to contribute to technological development in the era of large models.
Compared to well-known commercial products, MinerU is still young. If you encounter any issues or if the results are not as expected, please submit an issue on [issue](https://github.com/opendatalab/MinerU/issues) and **attach the relevant PDF**.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4bea02c9-6d54-4cd6-97ed-dff14340982c

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
If you encounter any installation issues, please first consult the FAQ.
If the parsing results are not as expected, refer to the Known Issues.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

SECURITY.md

demo/pdfs

docker/compose.yaml
docker/global
docs
docs/assets
docs/chemical_knowledge_introduction
docs/en
docs/images
docs/requirements.txt
docs/zh

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Remove headers, footers, footnotes, page numbers, etc., to ensure semantic coherence.
- Output text in human-readable order, suitable for single-column, multi-column, and complex layouts.
- Preserve the structure of the original document, including headings, paragraphs, lists, etc.
- Extract images, image descriptions, tables, table titles, and footnotes.
- Automatically recognize and convert formulas in the document to LaTeX format.
- Automatically recognize and convert tables in the document to HTML format.
- Automatically detect scanned PDFs and garbled PDFs and enable OCR functionality.

name: MinerU/demo 模块
description: [模块级] MinerU 项目的 demo 模块 (example)。来源: https://github.com/opendatalab/MinerU

genes.title: demo 模块说明
genes.content:

name: MinerU/docker 模块
description: [模块级] MinerU 项目的 docker 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/opendatalab/MinerU

genes.title: docker 模块说明
genes.content:
MinerU provides a convenient Docker deployment method, which helps quickly set up the environment and solve some tricky environment compatibility issues.
You can get the [Docker Deployment Instructions](https://opendatalab.github.io/MinerU/quick_start/docker_deployment/) in the documentation.

---
